H0.text: What team does controversial quarterback Michael Vick play for in the National Football League in the USA. Atlanta Falcons

H1.text: What team does controversial quarterback Michael Vick play for in the National Football League in the USA. New York Jets

H2.text: What team does controversial quarterback Michael Vick play for in the National Football League in the USA. Pittsburgh Steelers

H3.text: What team does controversial quarterback Michael Vick play for in the National Football League in the USA. Iggles

A4.text: Vick signed a one-year $5 million contract with the New York Jets on March 21, 2014, the same day the Jets released Mark Sanchez.

A5.text: On June 12, 2017, Vick retired as an Atlanta Falcon.
